GapFillInput.Instruction: Complete this letter by typing one suitable word in each gap.

Content.Question:
Dear Johannes,
I’m writing to tell you about the new apartment block that I’ve just moved to. Living on my own has been good fun – I like the independence. Sitting on my balcony every morning watching the waves roll in while eating|having my breakfast is blissful.
I saw our friend Mike from college last week. He was jogging|running|walking along the beach looking very fit. He’s moved out here too – can you believe it! There’s a resident cat too who seems to spend most of her time lying in the shade, sleeping. I’m just not used to having the time to watch the world go by.
If you want to see a picture of the complex you can do so by typing in www.fcomplex.com on the Internet. Well, I’m looking forward to seeing you in a few weeks’ time.
Love Cristina. x
